definitions.title: vb. denom. Pi.
definitions.body: be jealous, zealous (Gerber:131) ;—Pf. 3 ms. [[קִנֵּא]] Nu 25:13+; 1 s. [[קִנֵּאתִי]] Zec 1:14 + etc. ; Impf. [[יְקַנֵּא]] Is 11:13, Pr 23:17, etc.; Inf. abs. [[קַנּׁא]] 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14; cstr. sf. [[קַנְאוֹ]] Nu 25:11; [[קַנּאׁתוֹ]] 2Sa 21:2; Pt. [[מְקַנֵּא]] Nu 11:29;—
be jealous of, c. acc. [[אֶת־אִשְׁתּוֹ]] Nu 5:14, Nu 5:14, Nu 5:30 (P); in rivalry Is 11:13.
be envious of c. [[ב]] pers., Ge 30:1 (E), Ge 37:11 (J) Ps 37:1, Ps 73:3, Pr 3:31, Pr 23:17, Pr 24:1, Pr 24:19; c. acc. pers. Ge 26:14 (J), Ez Eze 31:9; c. [[ל]] pers. Ps 106:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of God, [[לְשֵׁם קָדְשִׁי]] Ez Eze 39:25, [[לְאַרְחוֹ]] Jn 2:18, ´[[לִירוּשׁ]]: Zec 1:14, [[לְחִיּוֹן]] Zec 8:2, Zec 8:2.
excite to jealous anger, c. [[בִּ]] instr. De 32:21 a (dub. ; probably [[הַקְנִאוּנִי]]; cf. v:De 32:16, De 32:21 b), 1Ki 14:22.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: provoke to jealous anger: Impf. 3 mpl. sf. [[יַקְנִאֻהוּ]] De 32:16; [[יַקְנִיאוּהוּ]] Ps 78:58 (‖[[וַיַּכְעִיסוּהוּ ]]) 1 s [[אַקְנִיאֵם]] De 32:21 b; Pt. metapl. [[מַקְנֶה]] Ez Eze 8:3 (Ges:§ 75 q, del Co.).
